mdRecord.dcterms:title: Isaac Newton Haynes Cemetery
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Located literally under the high voltage power lines where they cross Barberry Rd SE (just south of 1562 Barberry Rd SE). Access is by a well maintained access lane on the left just beyond the Appalachian Power right of way. The Cemetery is fenced but overgrown with brairs. The cemetery can be seen from Barberry Rd. and from Google Earth & Google Maps. N 36 53.425 W 080 16.445' Courthouse District
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
